channel.title: Command and script for ::pickup, ::item
channel.description: Hello, Im requesting the command and script for ::pickup and ::item the source I am using disabled it and I dont know how to fix it because I dont want to mess around with it yet since I am still learning how to edit THanks

item.title: Command and script for ::pickup, ::item
item.dc:creator: @bigballers bigballers
item.description:
@bigballers wrote:

idk… if this is it or if it is just 1 part of it but here trying to help
if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));

            if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) {
                addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
            } else {
                sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist");
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! ");
        }
    }

Read full topic
